Field Detail

attributesResolved

protected boolean attributesResolved

mustApplyRotation

protected boolean mustApplyRotation
Flag to indicate the rotation must be applied to the SurfaceImage. Rotation is applied the first time that the image is rendered.

parent

protected KMLGroundOverlay parent
Constructor Detail

KMLSurfaceImageImpl

public KMLSurfaceImageImpl(KMLTraversalContext tc,
                           KMLGroundOverlay overlay)
Create an screen image.

Parameters:
tc - the current KMLTraversalContext.
overlay - the Overlay element containing.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the traversal context is null.
IllegalArgumentException - if the parent overlay or the traversal context is null.
Method Detail

applyRotation

protected void applyRotation(DrawContext dc)
Apply a rotation to the corner points of the overlay.

Parameters:
dc - Current draw context.

computeRotatedCorners

protected List<LatLon> computeRotatedCorners(DrawContext dc,
                                             Sector sector,
                                             Angle rotation)
Rotate the corners of the overlay region. Rotation is performed around a surface normal through the center of the overlay sector.

Parameters:
dc - Current draw context.
sector - Sector that defines the overlay region.
rotation - Rotation angle. Positive angles produce counterclockwise rotation.
Returns:
Rotated corners.
